author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

One step to resolve the cassette shift issue for V18 where the shift will move the passive elements as well

#### PR validation:

Test using the dump tool for checking with fireworks

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-hgx341A One step to resolve cassette shift issue for V18 where the shift will move the passive elements as well
